availableEntities: North Africa, West and Central Asia

title: Calories lost and wasted per capita
subtitle: Food losses and waste are expressed in per capita terms by dividing the total caloric losses and wastage in each region by its total population. This includes loss and wastage in all supply chain stages, from (and including) on-farm harvesting through to final consumer waste.

display.name: Per capita food losses and waste

sourceDesc: Lipinski, B. et al. (2013). Reducing Food Loss and Waste. World Resources Institute.
selectedEntityNames: North Africa, West and Central Asia
